text: Gentleman. M'Lady.

You will always remember this as
the day that you almost caught
Captain Jack Sparrow!
Now, will you shoot him?
Open fire!

Aww yeah! Are you ready to learn English
with one of the best adventure movies of all time?

In today's lesson, we'll follow
Jack Sparrow and Will Turner

while try to steal a ship from
the British Royal Navy.

This will be a great opportunity for you to
 learn some specific and nautical vocabulary in English,
that is, words about navigation and sailing.

As you probably already know, this is one
 of the great things about learning English
with different movies and series.

They give you all sorts of real-life situations that
can be useful in gaining English fluency.

So, are you ready?
Let's dive in!

course is perfect for you.
